===Etymology===
Etymology unclear. One theory is that the word was an alteration of {{m|ja|放る|はふる|tr=hafuru|to [[throw over]], to [[throw on]]}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Another theory holds that the word came by extension from how a bird interlaces its wings across its back, leading to the current kanji compound of {{m|ja|羽|tr=ha||wing}} + {{m|ja|織る|織り|weaving|tr=ori}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Alternately, these kanji may be just [[ateji]].<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>
